In the Fall you can layer it with a cardigan, throw on some leggings, a scarf, and a great pair of boots. There's just no end to the wearability of this dress. For now, feel the freedom inherent in Summer and enjoy the tunic in all it's simple glory! Sundress features braided spaghetti straps with a ruffle hem. core.name: Weekend Getaway Off-The-Shoulder Maxi Dress

description: You know that point you reach where it feels like it’s been a 46-day work week, and you’ve been on 80-hour a week shifts, and you don’t even get paid overtime? That point where you are painfully aware that if you don’t get a chance to recharge soon, they’ll have to move your office into one of those special “padded” rooms, which would be a shame because it’s really hard to type with your hands tucked tightly into the sleeves of your straight jacket? Yeah, it’s time for a Weekend Getaway, where you can channel all that mojo into a cute dress, and a nice break from the real world (preferably with someone special, or at least on the hunt). This dress is quite cathartic in that way. It’s your feel-good travel companion, whether you’re actually going out of town or not. It might just make you feel so good that you decide you don’t need that getaway after all (but you should take it anyway, just to show off the dress). Model is wearing a small. • 100% Rayon • Hand Wash Cold • Lined to

core.name: Forever Mine White Dress

description: Every woman has an outfit in her wardrobe, whether it be a dress, a top and jeans, or a romper, that she loves more than anything else she owns. If the house catches on fire, after she's secured her loved ones, it will be the first item of clothing that she laments (if she hasn't taken to sleeping in it out of paranoia). If you have no idea what I'm talking about, then clearly, this dress is meant for you. Your first thoughts will be, \"You're Forever Mine,\" as you open the box and you get that first real glance at this radiant beauty. Trust us, every single time you see it, you will grin (and possibly feel an urge to check the batteries in your smoke detectors). Peasant style dress has a baby doll silhouette and features long bell sleeves and lace accents. Dress has an invisible back zipper with double hook and eye closures. Model is wearing a x-small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported
title: Forever Mine White Dress

core.name: Spring Surprise White Floral Print Midi Dress

description: Spring is full of surprises. One day you're bundled in layers of thermals, sweaters, and coats, then you blink and suddenly the flowers are blooming, the birds are singing, and you are daydreaming about picnics in the park. Well we have our own little Spring Surprise for you; one might even say it's a surprise fit for a Spring (you know, as opposed to \"fit for a king.\") And just like that unexpected day when you walk out to lush flora that blossomed overnight, glorious sunlight, and that absolutely perfect temperature, this dress is absolutely perfect, and equally as refreshing as a spring day. And now that you know what you're going to wear, you can focus on what to pack for your romantic picnic. This floral pleated skater dress features an exposed silver zipper in the back with a clasp at the top along with a triple lined white, sheer, tulle skirt. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Dry Clean Only • Lined • Imported
title: Spring Surprise White Floral Print Midi Dress

core.name: Premier Event Ivory Maxi Dress

description: Every Premier Event needs a leading lady, and every leading lady needs an equally premier dress. But what if you can't afford designer prices? Or you haven't had the breaks in life that would allow you to cozy up to a designer to have one custom made? We hear you, therefore, we bring you the closest thing possible, and it comes with a price tag you can actually obtain without taking out a second mortgage on your house--imagine that! Now, if we can figure out a way to hook you up with a kicking role in a soon-to-be famous movie, you'll be all set. Just don't forget us little people. Especially when you're up there winning all of those awards. P.S. Save us some swag from that famous gift basket. I mean, who really needs pure gold flakes in their bubble bath, right? *cough, us, cough* Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Lined • Imported

core.name: The Award Goes To Gold Sequin Maxi Dress

description: It’s a crime that no one has rolled out the red carpet for you yet. You’re already modeling the finest fashions every day. And your performances? Oscar-worthy. Like that time you smiled at your ex’s new floozy, and said it was nice to meet her? Or when you reassured him that it happens to lots of guys (even though you don’t actually know of a single male who cries at the end of James Bond). Well at last, your time has come. All of your hard work and effort have paid off. And the Award Goes to ... you! This dress is your prize. And as good as it might look in a window box on your wall, the most gracious thing to do would be to wear it, so others can appreciate it on you, as much as you appreciate its don't-you-wish-this-was-yours-ness of it. Halter neckline maxi features full seaquins, elastic back, exposed gold zipper, half lined skirt, side slit. Model is wearing a small. • 100% Polyester • Hand Wash Cold • Fully Lined • Imported
title: The Award Goes To Gold Sequin Maxi Dress
